text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the sunshine
Chasing clouds away
Heart is feeling alright
Ready for the day

[Verse 2]
City streets are buzzing
Laughter fills the air
Every corner singing
Love is everywhere

[Chorus]
Daylight dreams are shining
Colors all around
Life's a rhythm finding
Dancing to the sound

[Verse 3]
People passing
Smiling
Energy so bright
Every step a moment
Feels so pure
So right

[Bridge]
Open skies above us
Endless blue and free
In this world of wonder
Here’s where I want to be

[Chorus]
Daylight dreams are shining
Colors all around
Life's a rhythm finding
Dancing to the sound
title: Daylight Dreams
